Test-div.name: Opening of The Right panel for line

Folder-div.Test-div: when clicking on the Line object the right panel should open and display information about the line. There should be at the top the name of the line and the icon on the line. Under that there should be a list of schedule.

The header of schedule should display: - Service type as an icon - Eventiualy an 'i' icon - The name of the schedule - Plus_minus icons When clicking the object it should extend itself to display all the station in the schedule and the information: For each displayed station there should be from left to right: - The elapsed time from the start - The start and stop time at the station - An icon of the station (rounded top or bottom for both end of the station and continuous for the other with a circle at the center) - The name of the station
when clicking the cross inside the right panel the right panel shoudl close and all the lines are higlighted again.
when resizing the windows on the right the canvas should adapt, when resizing the windows from the top the canvas should also adapt
